caption.p:
Patterns of the epidemic in Lombardy (left panel) and Lazio (right panel). Legends in the middle. (Sky TG 24
https://tg24.sky.it/cronaca/approfondimenti/foto/numero-contagi-coronavirus-italia.html#4 : data from the Ministry of Health processed by the ISS,
https://www.iss.it/coronavirus ) [12].
